description: Warm up at the crag in the Mount Marmot Hoody and make sure your name is on the collar when you take it off because this is the one your climbing partner will try to claim. A lightweight knit that blends recycled polyester and cotton means it’ll perform in the wild but retains that soft feel that’ll make it your everyday go-to.
name: Marmot Mount Marmot Hoody - Mens
